title: Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2022 (Revocation) Regulations 2023 and
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary 
Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2022 (Revocation) Regulations 2023 and 
come into operation on 18 April 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (precautionary confinement birds) regulation 2022 (revocation) regulation 2023 come operation 18 april 2023

title: Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2022 (Revocation) Regulations 2023 and
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations 

2022 are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 April, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [179] 3
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (precautionary confinement birds) regulation 2022 revoked given official seal 13 april 2023 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 18th april 2023 179 3

title: Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2022 (Revocation) Regulations 2023 and
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations revoke the Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of 
Birds) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [179]
